sentences.en: As a former unionist, he'll be more sensitive to the demands of the people.
sentences.cn: 作为曾经的工会主义者，他会对民众的要求更加敏感。

sentences.en: I was not a trade unionist.
To begin with the Unionist soldiers fought without any real purpose and their losses were terrible.
sentences.cn: 而起初,北方军的士兵却不知道他们到底为何而战.因此,他们遭受了可怕的失败.

sentences.en: Unionist immediately objected ( rejected ) the idea, calling it a betrayal.
sentences.cn: 工会当人立即反对了这一提议, 并称其为一种背叛.

sentences.en: Unionist immediately rejected the idea, calling it a betrayal.
sentences.cn: 工会人员立即反对了这个意见, 称这是泄密.

words.tran_cn: 组织成工会的；[物][化学] 未电离的
工会主义；联合主义；联邦主义
使…成立联盟；使…加入工会（unionize的过去分词）
使……加入工会；使……成立工会

trans.tran_cn: 工会会员，工会主义者，联合主义者，(U-)联邦主义者
